name: articus/path-handler
description: Library for API development with Zend Expressive that simplifies creating operation middlewares and registering them in router

suggest.doctrine/annotations: It is required for Articus\PathHandler\MetadataProvider\Annotation (default metadata provider).
suggest.nikic/fast-route: It is required for Articus\PathHandler\Router\FastRoute (default router)
suggest.zendframework/zend-cache: It is required for Articus\PathHandler\MetadataProvider\Annotation (default metadata provider) and Articus\PathHandler\Router\FastRoute (default router).
suggest.zendframework/zend-serializer: It is required for most Zend Cache adapters to store data.
suggest.articus/data-transfer: It is required for Articus\PathHandler\Attribute\Transfer and Articus\PathHandler\Producer\Transfer
